analysis: Market analysis indicates balanced conditions with no clear directional bias. RSI at 71.53 indicates overbought territory, suggesting caution for long positions. Money Flow Index at 88.38 indicates strong buying activity. MACD histogram positive with bullish crossover confirmed. Price maintaining above Bollinger middle band, uptrend intact. Price structure supports bullish continuation with MA and SAR confirmation. Ichimoku cloud analysis supports bullish bias. Stochastic at 89.00 warns of overbought exhaustion.

indicator_insights.rsi: Overbought at 71.5, profit-taking likely. Caution for new longs.
indicator_insights.mfi: Heavy money inflow at 88.4, euphoric buying. Reversal risk elevated.
indicator_insights.stochastic: Extreme overbought at 89.0, bearish divergence possible.
indicator_insights.macd: Strong bullish momentum. Histogram expanding positive (4.13402), trend strength confirmed.
indicator_insights.bollinger_bands: Price holding above midline. Bullish bias maintained, support at 4188.66400.
indicator_insights.moving_average: Price 0.71% above MA. Uptrend confirmed, MA acting as dynamic support.
indicator_insights.parabolic_sar: SAR positioned below price at 4160.70000. Uptrend active, trailing stop recommended.
indicator_insights.ichimoku: Price above cloud components. Strong bullish structure, all systems aligned for longs.
